Amazon Service Partner Network (SPN) With PAS 
Amazon Service Partner Network (SPN) With PAS 

You are here: Home1 / About Us2 / Amazon Service Partner Network

What is the Amazon Service Provider Network(SPN)


The Amazon Service Provider Network (SPN) is a curated community of trusted agencies and solution providers who offer a range of services to help sellers succeed on Amazon. SPN partners are equipped with the latest tools, training, and insights to help new sellers navigate the complexities of the Amazon marketplace and maximize their sales potential.

Why Partner With US?
By partnering with PAS, you gain seamless access to the Amazon SPN and unlock a wealth of benefits designed to ensure your success as a new seller on Amazon. Here’s how we can help:

Exclusive Benefits of Partnering with Pas



Complimentary First-Year Managed Support : Your primary image is the first thing potential customers see. A clear, high-quality image grabs attention and encourages clicks.

Dedicated Partner Development Manager:You’ll have a dedicated manager to keep you informed about the latest Amazon programs and trends, providing the support you need to thrive.

Unified Account Management:Manage all your client accounts efficiently from a single SPN account, streamlining your operations and enhancing productivity

Tailored SPN Training:Access specialized training resources designed for PAS employees, ensuring your team is always ahead of the curve.

Promote your Services:Market your services directly to Amazon sellers through the SPN on Seller Central, expanding your reach and driving business growth.
New Seller Success (NSS) Strategic Accounts
Amazon’s NSS Strategic Accounts team focuses on recruiting and developing high-value sellers and brands on Amazon’s Marketplace. Selected sellers receive free account support for up to one year, including a designated Account Manager who acts as a Trusted Advisor. This support helps scale your business, reach new customers, and boost sales.

Benefits of NSS Strategic Accounts




Personalized Insights and Recommendations :Receive customized strategies for key areas like fulfillment, account health, conversion growth, merchandising, and global expansion.

Early Access to Programs and Deals:Stay updated on the latest seller offerings, beta programs, and deal opportunities with tailored guidance on the best options for you.

Dedicated Issue Assistance:Gain access to a team of specialists who can help manage and resolve issues quickly, minimizing business interruptions.

Strategic Account Manager Support:Benefit from up to one year of support from a designated Account Manager dedicated to helping you scale and grow your business.

Promote your Services:Market your services directly to Amazon sellers through the SPN on Seller Central, expanding your reach and driving business growth.
Why This matters for You?
Partnering with PAS means you’re not just joining a network—you’re gaining access to Amazon’s exclusive resources and support. Our dedicated team at PAS will ensure that you are well-prepared to leverage the full potential of the SPN, driving your success on the Amazon platform.

Eligibility Criteria for   NSS Strategic AccountsWe are Looking for Brand Owners Who


Are new to selling on Amazon
Have the potential to generate over $250K in revenue within their first year
Plan to invest in marketing and growth
Offer prime products with the ability to replenish inventory quickly



How to Get Started? Fill up the contact form.
